name: 48H Tower
description:
In this game, you have to survive. Skeletons and wolves are going to kill you if you let them enter. Use traps and your weapons to beat them. Survive 3 minutes and another floor will be unlocked. Go to the third floor and you win. You have loot box in each floor -> higher you are, better stuff you get.

Some advice to succed on your escaping:
- USE TRAPS ! it will very hard if you don"t put traps with Left Shift. 
But be careful you will need wood and stone which can be loot on monsters.
- You should use bow against wolves.
- Don"t forget to use loot box when you have wood : it give you a random weapon. (Common,Rare,Legendary)

Game created by Yami & Toti in 48h.

We recupurated some 3d models from another gamejam (Wolf,skeleton,some traps,chest)
